Looking at two Redis Go libraries:

redigo:
  https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/gomodule/redigo/redis
  https://github.com/gomodule/redigo

go-redis:
  https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/redis/go-redis/v9
  https://github.com/redis/go-redis

NOTE: FOr these I used Redis that run via Docker in the email-archiver make target "test-docker-local-env"
